title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Mar 03 2020
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Mar 03 2020
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Democrat establishment expects to lose presidency, wants to keep their control of the party, lose with Plugs. Rush was wrong when he said Biden would never make it, assumed they would try to win. Bloomberg disconnect from reality on display at Fox town hall. Donna Brazile loses her mind on Fox, tells GOP Chair Ronna McDaniel to go to hell. Democrats don’t want to let Bernie win because they don’t want to lose control of the party apparatus like the GOP establishment did. Plugs stumbles over the preamble of the Declaration of Independence because he knows he can’t mention God. Biden thinks Super Tuesday is Super Thursday. Brazile was caught cheating for Hillary in 2016 debate. Operation Chaos. Bloomberg jealous of Trump.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Dukakis: We’re seeing a new Joe Biden. Operation Chaos. Bloomberg town hall on Fox. Democrat establishment fears down ballot blowout if Bernie is nominee. Democrat establishment in denial about where party is heading. What if Bernie is the savior? Establishment exists in every town in America. Caller wants Trump to start running against Michelle Obama. Hagel endorses Plugs.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Comey votes for Biden. Hagel endorses Biden. More Bloomberg from Fox town hall. Chris Matthews out at MSNBC for complimenting woman on her appearance. Biden campaign rejects Comey endorsement. Drive-By Media hypes Biden momentum, endorsements. Donna Brazile loses it on Fox. WHO guidelines on how to talk about the coronavirus. Howard Fineman: Matthews is okay, still lusting after women. Bloomberg: I don’t disagree with Trump’s policies, I just don’t like his style.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
